column2: "Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones. My fears were completely unfounded, then."
"Autowords don't just let you shout out battle cries, they also let you warn others of danger, like if you get taken by surprise."
"Some ARKS find really unique uses for them. You'll be missing out if you don't jump in the game."
"Heh. This reminds me of this one time back in the day, when I forgot my autowords were on..."
